com.hypernovalabs.multichoiceform.form

Class FormDateStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hypernovalabs.multichoiceform.form.FormStep
      • com.hypernovalabs.multichoiceform.form.FormDateStep

  • public class FormDateStep
extends FormStep
    Provides an AlertDialog containing a DatePicker to select a date. DateFormat is customizable, along with min and max Date, and the Dialog buttons. Child of FormStep.

    • Constructor Summary

      Main constructor of FormDateStep.
      FormDateStep(FormStepView view, boolean required)
      Constructor with the added "required" parameter.
